entry.title: WIND WARNING , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:03 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 10:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: WSW 73 km/h gust 87 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening and risk of freezing rain. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 70 gusting to 100 this evening then diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
